lines.text: We are one with the power that created us. We're safe and all is well in our world.
I love you. I love you. I really love you. I love you.
I don't take drugs or drink or... I don't even like coffee very much. I'm just a total milk-o-holic.

[about her declining health]
I'm sorry. I know it's not normal but I can't help it.
